text: {| |} JS Genkai is a Hiuchi Class Auxiliary Multi-purpose Support (AMS) ship of the Japan Maritime Self-Defense Force (JMSDF).Werth, Eric. (2007). The ship was built by Universal in Keihin and commissioned into service on 20 Feb 2008. The primary mission of the Genkai is to support training exercises of other ships, including shooting practice and torpedo launching practice.Global Security.org, AMS Hiuchi Class ==Notes== ==References== * Werth, Eric. (2007). Naval Institute Guide to Combat Fleets of the World: Their Ships, Aircraft, and Systems. Annapolis: Naval Institute Press. ==External links== * JMSDF, AMS-4304 げんかい Genkai * Global Security.com, AMS Hiuchi Class, ship list Category:Hiuchi-class support ships Category:2007 ships
title: JS Genkai
